ai.desc: Starts with #wSlimy #wAppendage. Afterwards, has a 65-35 split between #wThrash and #wSlimy #wAppendage, but cannot use #wThrash three times in a row or #wSlimy #wAppendage twice in a row. Uses #wDegenerate every three or four turns with a 50-50 split.
ai.notes: Innate #uThorns #u1, #uMalleable #u1, and #uMetallicize #u1. Slimed status cards go in the draw pile.

ai.desc: Starts with #wSilent #wSpear. Afterwards, moves are based on the number of minions, avoiding using the same move twice: NL If 0, uses #wFrost #wSummon. NL If 1, 25-75 split between #wSilent #wSpear and #wFrost #wSummon. NL If 2, 30-50-20 split between #wSilent #wSpear, #wFrost #wSummon, and #wGentle #wSnow. NL If 3, 35-25-40 split between #wSilent #wSpear, #wFrost #wSummon, and #wGentle #wSnow. NL Otherwise, 40-60 split between Silent Spear and #wGentle #wSnow.
ai.notes: Spawns with 2 Frozen Soldiers. Wound status cards go in the discard pile.

ai.desc: Cycles #wTriple #wBite -> #wSquabble -> #wClaw #wand #wHorn -> #wVenom Spit. If at half HP or less, uses #wThree #wAs #wOne and then starts the cycle from the beginning, skipping #wSquabble.
ai.notes: Innate #uSquabbling #uHeads. The status given by moves rotates Slimed -> Wound -> Burned. All status cards go in the discard pile.

ai.desc: Starts with #wBeam. NL NL Afterwards, if #uSolar #uCharge has 7 or more charges, uses #wSolar #wFlare. NL NL Otherwise, has a chance to use #wSolar #wEnergy based on the number of turns since the last time it used the move: 0% for 1 turn, 25% for 2, 50% for 3, 75% for 4, 100% for 5 or more. NL NL Otherwise, uses either #wBeam or #wTentacle #wSlap with a 50-50 chance that is shifted by 25 for each additional time one move has been used compared to the other, in favor of the less used move. For example, if two #wBeams and one #wTentacle #wSlap had been used so far, that would give a 25% chance of #wBeam and a 75% chance of #wTentacle #wSlap.
ai.notes: Innate #uSolar #uCharge. Burn status cards go in the discard pile.

ai.notes: Dazed status cards go on top of the draw pile. #uSulfuric #uVortex is a debuff that deals damage each turn.
